Uses of IRole in whitecat.core.role
 

Subinterfaces of IRole in whitecat.core.role
 interface IPublicRole
          This interface is used to tag a role as public, that is a role that must have a public part that will be weaved/transferred to the agent proxy.
 

Methods in whitecat.core.role that return IRole
abstract  IRole RoleRepository.findRole(RoleDescriptor descriptor)
          Searches for a role implementation starting from a role descriptor.
 

Methods in whitecat.core.role with parameters of type IRole

          Installs a new role descriptor in the system.
abstract  boolean RoleRepository.removeRole(IRole role)
          Removes a role from the repository.
 

Uses of IRole in whitecat.core.role.descriptors
 

Subinterfaces of IRole in whitecat.core.role.descriptors
 interface GenericRole
          This interface defines the base structure of a GenericRole, that is a role that can be used within the RoleX system.
